duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage financial reporting for Real Estate assets and transactions.
Provide accounting expertise for Real Estate property portfolios and clients.
Prepare and review financial statements, ensuring compliance with Real Estate industry standards.
Collaborate with Real Estate teams to support financial decision-making and strategy.
Assist in audit and tax activities for Real Estate entities.
Contribute to career development and mentoring of junior accounting staff.

education_certification.credential: CPA Certification required. Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field.
